Articles.Content:
Hey I'm looking for  a mod that tells you how much your planet or moon  is going to be rotated until you hit the ground approx. obviously just if your vessel won't be accelerated until then. Would be perfect if it had a built-in aeroforce calculation lile the mod Trajectories.

Hope you know any mod like this, 

thank you

If I understand you correctly, Trajectories already has this ability. Just choose the "complete" option in the Trajectories window and it will show your landing site even for airless bodies. Sometimes the X is hidden by the terrain, so I frequently will use "Body Fixed Mode" as well, which shows what the trajectory would look like from an observer on the surface of the planet/moon, rather than from the vessel. That mode would then show the trajectory line hitting where the X is, even if you can't see the X.
Well that's awesome. Looks like i'll have to check the settings of my mods more thoroughly... Much thanks
